charinfo.name: Sai
charinfo.description: A current member of the Elite ANBU Root, Sai is a quiet, but expressive individual with a mysterious past. Sai uses a set of brushes with a special ink to give life to his art, from tigers to lions to bears, that allow him to compete with his enemies.

abilities.name: Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Lions
abilities.description: Sai creates a number of ink lions to attack one enemy dealing 30 damage to them, and for 1 turn, Sai will gain 20 destructible defense.

abilities.name: Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Snake
abilities.description: Sai creates a snake made of ink to trap one enemy, stunning their physical and chakra skills for 1 turn. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill ignores invulnerability. During 'Adaptive Painting', this skill will be replaced.

abilities.name: Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Bird
abilities.description: Sai summons a giant ink bird that crashes to one enemy, dealing 25 damage to them and stunning their physical and chakra skills for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Adaptive Painting
abilities.description: For 3 turns, any ally that is stunned will become invulnerable for 1 turn; any ally that has chakra removed/stolen will gain 1 random chakra; any ally that receives successful new non-affliction damage by an enemy will increase Sai's damage by 10 for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Ink Clone
abilities.description: This skill makes Sai invulnerable for 1 turn.
